title: Minecraft still yet to implement planned ban on NFTs
description: In July 2022, the announcement that Minecraft intended to ban the use of NFTs (non-fungible tokens) on player-run servers caused a significant stir in the Web3 community. However, nearly a year later, the anticipated action is yet to be enforced, though it remains on the horizon. Minecraft says the decision is awaiting confirmation Mojang, the ... Read more
